overview: Talented detective Matsui is investigating a serial stalker. Four female victims seem to be connected by the same stalker and Matsui is determined to catch the assailant.  When the thread of the case connects Matsui with deep scars of his heart left in the past, tragedy ensues.
tagline: That which he lost – was it that which had already past, or that which was to come?
title: That Disappearance
